The Cake Shop

The Cake Shop is a little experiment built with one page scroll jquery plugin.


Visit site

Premier League 2014

This is a database of all the matches played in Premier League 2013/14. ESPN API was used and it's written in Ruby on Rails.


Visit site

New Banana Club

This is a web app I made using javascript. You can listen to archive of the famous Hong Kong radio show "New Banana Club".

Me

Hello, my name is Colloque Tsui. I have a passion for web designing, my dream is to become professional frontend developer. I am currently doing Master in IT at University of Aberdeen, Scotland.

Resume: Colloque Tsui's Resume

If you want to get in touch, you can send me a message or feel free to fire me an email! I will get back to you ASAP!

This site

This website was built with Bootstrap 3 framework and jQuery. I have also used Google fonts and FontAwesome for the body and social network icons. The fonts I have used is Dosis. Be sure to check out their awesome works!
